summary: Frontend testing completed for Fear Meter - Horror biometric simulation app. All requested features are working correctly: Language Selector with 9 languages, localStorage persistence, Watch Mode with circular interface and BPM-based status display.
critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings in useNightmareProtocol.js about missing dependencies in useCallback/useEffect - minor, not affecting functionality
ESLint warnings in InvestorDemo.jsx and MainButton.jsx about ref cleanup - minor, not affecting functionality
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Language selector opens from side menu, all 9 languages display correctly (EN, ES, PT, IT, JA, ZH, DE, RU, FR), language selection updates UI immediately and persists to localStorage. Watch Mode shows circular interface with BPM, biometric ring fills based on BPM, status changes correctly (STABLE <= 100, ELEVATED 100-120, CRITICAL > 120). All biometric data is MOCKED/SIMULATED.
